entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
